astro-splide

The Astro component for Splide.
Splide is a slider/carousel written in TypeScript.
astro-splide astro-splide splidejs/splide

Install

Read the full doc on Github

Examples

Simple Example

Simple splide example, which is a slider of 3 images.

Full code

Code Snippet

Basic Example

Basic splide example:

  • 2 slides per page on large screen and a single slide on screen smaller than 640px. It makes use of breakpoint options as described in splidejs documentation,
  • and log on the console on slide changes.

Full code

Code Snippet

Autoplay Example

Play/Pause button, and options in the frontmatter.

Full code

Code Snippet

Extension Example

Extension splide example: Uses @splidejs/splide-extension-auto-scroll extension.

Caution

There are some steps to take care of:

  • This is your responsability to install https://splidejs.com/extensions/auto-scroll/
  • Note that <SplideExtension> is used instead of <Splide>
  • Note that the script part must indicate which extension you are using
  • Limitation: a single extension can be used per page

Full code
